member.name: T:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo
member.summary: Represents an assembly in the external CLR instance

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.GetName
member.summary: Gets an AssemblyName for this assembly
member.returns: An object that contains the fully parsed display name for this assembly

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveType(System.Int32,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.summary: Returns the type identified by the specified metadata token, in the context defined by the specified generic parameters.
member.remarks: Generic parameters are ignored in this implementation.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the type identified by the specified metadata token.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveMethod(System.Int32,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.summary: Returns the method or constructor identified by the specified metadata token, in the context defined by the specified generic parameters.
member.remarks: Generic parameters are ignored in this implementation.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveMethod(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the method or constructor identified by the specified metadata token.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveField(System.Int32,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.summary: Returns the field identified by the specified metadata token, in the context defined by the specified generic parameters.
member.remarks: Generic parameters are ignored in this implementation.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveField(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the field identified by the specified metadata token.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveMember(System.Int32,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.summary: Returns the type or member identified by the specified metadata token, in the context defined by the specified generic parameters.
member.remarks: Generic parameters are ignored in this implementation.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveMember(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the type or member identified by the specified metadata token.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveSignature(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the signature blob identified by a metadata token (not implemented).
member.returns: An array of bytes representing the signature blob.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ResolveString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the string identified by the specified metadata token (not implemented).

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.EnumerateMembers
member.summary: Gets the collection of all members defined in this assembly

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.EnumerateMethods
member.summary: Gets the collection of all methods defined in this assembly

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.GetTypes
member.summary: Gets the types defined in this assembly.
member.returns: An array that contains all the types that are defined in this assembly.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Type object that represents the specified type.
member.param: The full name of the type.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified type, or null if the type is not found.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.GetType(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the Type object with the specified name in the assembly instance and optionally throws an exception if the type is not found.
member.param: The full name of the type.
true to throw an exception if the type is not found; false to return null.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified type.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.GetType(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the Type object with the specified name in the assembly instance, with the options of ignoring the case, and of throwing an exception if the type is not found.
member.param: The full name of the type.
true to throw an exception if the type is not found; false to return null.
true to ignore the case of the type name; otherwise, false.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified type.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.GetExportedTypes
member.summary: Gets the public types defined in this assembly that are visible outside the assembly.
member.returns: An array that represents the types defined in this assembly that are visible outside the assembly.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.InnerModule
member.summary: Gets the underlying ClrMD module object

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.AssemblyReader
member.summary: Gets the assembly reader that was used to read this instance

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.FullName
member.summary: Gets the display name of the assembly

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.Location
member.summary: Gets the full path to the PE file containing this assembly, or an empty string if the assembly wasn't loaded from file.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.CodeBase
member.summary: Gets the full path to the PE file containing this assembly, or an empty string if the assembly wasn't loaded from file.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ExportedTypes
member.summary: Gets a collection of the public types defined in this assembly that are visible outside the assembly.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.IsDynamic
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the current assembly was generated dynamically at runtime by using reflection emit.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyInfo.ReflectionOnly
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this assembly was loaded into the reflection-only context.

member.name: T:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader
member.summary: Reads information about assemblies in the CLR isntances of external processes using ClrMD

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader.GetDynamicMethods(System.Diagnostics.Process)
member.summary: Gets the pseudo-assembly that represents the collection of dynamic methods in the specified process
member.param: Source process

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader.EnumerateMethods(System.Diagnostics.Process)
member.summary: Gets the collection of all methods in the specified process
member.param: Source process

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader.EnumerateModuleMethods(System.Diagnostics.Process,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the collection of all methods defined in the specified module of the process
member.param: Source process
Name of PE module file (without full path), or an empty string to use main module

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader.#ctor(Microsoft.Diagnostics.Runtime.ClrRuntime)
member.summary: Creates ClrAssemblyReader to read information from the specified CLR instance
member.param: Source CLR instance

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the assembly information object for the specified module name
member.param: Name of PE module file (without full path)

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader.Read(Microsoft.Diagnostics.Runtime.ClrModule)
member.summary: Gets the assembly information object for the specified ClrMD module object
member.param: ClrMD module object

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader.GetDynamicMethods
member.summary: Gets the pseudo-assembly that represents the collection of dynamic methods in the process containing CLR instance

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader.SourceRuntime
member.summary: Gets the CLR instance associated with this ClrAssemblyReader

member.name: T:CilTools.Runtime.ClrDynamicMethod
member.summary: Represents information about a dynamic method in the external CLR instance

member.name: T:CilTools.Runtime.ClrMethodInfo
member.summary: Represents information about the method in an external CLR instance

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrMethodInfo.InnerMethod
member.summary: Gets the underlying ClrMD method object

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrMethodInfo.ReturnType
member.summary: Gets the method's returned type

member.name: T:CilTools.Runtime.ClrStackFrameInfo
member.summary: Represents a single frame in the callstack of .NET application. The stack frame contains information about the called method and the location of the IL code executed within that method

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrStackFrameInfo.ToString
member.summary: Gets the full text representation of this stack frame
member.remarks: The full text representation contains full signature of the called method, including argument types. If this frame is not a call to a managed method, returns the name of the special frame from debugger API.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrStackFrameInfo.ToString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the text representation of this stack frame
member.param: Indicates whether the method should return full text representation
member.remarks: The full text representation contains full signature of the called method, including argument types. The short text representation only contains the method's name. If this frame is not a call to a managed method, returns the name of the special frame from debugger API.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrStackFrameInfo.Method
member.summary: Gets the method corresponding to this stack frame. The value could be null if this frame is a special frame not corresponding to a managed method, or if the library failed to construct MethodBase object for the called method.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrStackFrameInfo.ILOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset, in bytes, of the beginning of the IL code executed by this frame, relative to the beginning of the method body.
member.remarks: The library cannot accurately determine the currently executed instruction in every case, because the resulting native code could be optimized by JIT. As a result, the currently executed code is presented as the starting and ending offsets.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrStackFrameInfo.ILOffsetEnd
member.summary: Gets the offset, in bytes, of the end of the IL code executed by this frame, relative to the beginning of the method body.
member.remarks: The library cannot accurately determine the currently executed instruction in every case, because the resulting native code could be optimized by JIT. As a result, the currently executed code is presented as the starting and ending offsets.

member.name: T:CilTools.Runtime.ClrThreadInfo
member.summary: Represents the information about the managed thread in the external process CLR instance

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrThreadInfo.Get(Microsoft.Diagnostics.Runtime.ClrRuntime,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Reflection.Assembly},CilTools.Runtime.ClrAssemblyReader)
member.summary: Gets the information about managed threads in the specified CLR instance
member.param: The CLR isntance to fetch thread information from
The optional collection of assemblies preloaded from the target CLR instance, or null if you don't have any
The optional object to be used for reading assemblies from the target CLR isntance, or null if you don't have one
member.returns: The array of objects containing information about managed threads
member.exception: The value of parameter is null

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrThreadInfo.Print(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Prints the information about the current thread to the specified TextWriter
member.exception: The value of parameter is null

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.ClrThreadInfo.ToString
member.summary: Gets the information about the current thread

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrThreadInfo.StackTrace
member.summary: Gets the stack trace of the current thread
member.remarks: The stack trace is the sequence of the nested method calls made in the thread before it reached the current point of execution.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.ClrThreadInfo.DisplayString
member.summary: Gets the information about the current thread

member.name: T:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly
member.summary: Represents the pseudo-assembly that contains a collection of dynamic methods in the external process

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.#ctor(Microsoft.Diagnostics.Runtime.DataTarget,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates new DynamicMethodsAssembly object for the specified data target, optionally indicating whether the created object owns the data target.
member.param: ClrMD data target to read information from
true if this instance owns tha data target and should dispose it automatically when it is no longer needed

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.GetName
member.summary: Gets an AssemblyName for this assembly
member.returns: An object that contains the fully parsed display name for this assembly

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.EnumerateMethods
member.summary: Gets the collection of all methods defined in this assembly

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.GetTypes
member.summary: Gets the types defined in this assembly.
member.returns: An array that contains all the types that are defined in this assembly.
member.remarks: This implementation returns collection that consists of the single pseudo-type representing dynamic methods

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Type object that represents the specified type.
member.param: The full name of the type.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified type, or null if the type is not found.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.GetType(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the Type object with the specified name in the assembly instance and optionally throws an exception if the type is not found.
member.param: The full name of the type.
true to throw an exception if the type is not found; false to return null.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified type.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.GetType(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the Type object with the specified name in the assembly instance, with the options of ignoring the case, and of throwing an exception if the type is not found.
member.param: The full name of the type.
true to throw an exception if the type is not found; false to return null.
true to ignore the case of the type name; otherwise, false.
member.returns: An object that represents the specified type.

member.name: M:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.Dispose
member.summary: Releases unmagnaged resources associated with this assembly object
member.remarks: This method only disposes the underlying data target if this instance was constructed with the autoDispose parameter set to true.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.ChildType
member.summary: Gets pseudo-type that contains the collection of dynamic methods

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.Target
member.summary: ClrMD data target associated with this instance

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.FullName
member.summary: Gets the display name of the assembly

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.Location
member.summary: Gets the full path to the assembly. This implementation always returns an empty string.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.CodeBase
member.summary: Gets the full path to the assembly. This implementation always returns an empty string.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.IsDynamic
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the current assembly was generated dynamically at runtime.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.ReflectionOnly
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this assembly was loaded into the reflection-only context.

member.name: P:CilTools.Runtime.DynamicMethodsAssembly.ExportedTypes
member.summary: Gets a collection of the public types defined in this assembly that are visible outside the assembly.
member.remarks: This implementation returns an empty collection
